= Downloads =

There are a number of ways to acquire the MVPA project code depending on your preferred usage.

You can also retrieve the [http://www.pni.princeton.edu/mvpa/download.php?action=getinfo
latest release] of the toolbox.

The [http://code.google.com/p/princeton-mvpa-toolbox/source/checkout most up-to-date SVN development version].

Get the [http://code.google.com/p/princeton-mvpa-toolbox/downloads/list papers and abstracts] that the
MVPA toolbox is based on.
